# Situating LLMs

>
> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Noam Chomsky, "The False Promise of ChatGPT," _New York Times_, 8 March 2023.

## Chomsky's Concern

- Easy to dismiss. Chomsky paints with a broad brush, includes all of machine-learning and he has an historic animus against statistcal methods
- The point remains. The question is, What is the "conception of language and knowledge" entailed by ChatGPT and other generative LLMs?
